Netorare mean getting your lover stolen while Netori means stealing someone else’s lover it really just depends on perspective

@Noro_Degenerate Okay I see Netorare means when a guy's girlfriend or fiancée or wife gets stolen from them by another guy while Netori is when a girl steals another girl's boyfriend or fiancé or husband away from them. So Netorare = getting your lover stolen and Netori = stealing someone's lover. Alright I understand now so it doesn't really have to deal with cuckold or cuckquean I see.

The Mischievous Gentleman, shut up, you clearly don't know what you're talking about, stop spamming misinformation.  Netori(masu)寝取ます means to take, Netorare(ru) 寝取られる means to have something taken away, netorase(ru) 寝取らせる means to cause something to be taken.  It's just a verb with different conjugations that is reliant on the main topic.  There is no direct translation to "cuckold or cuckqueen"  Stop spreading your garbage.
